hampton.meetingHighlights: Several evening and weekend meetings near downtown and Phoebus; veterans-focused meeting available.
hampton.transitInfo: Served by Hampton Roads Transit (HRT) bus routes; nearby Amtrak station in Newport News for regional connections.

newport-news.meetingHighlights: Community meetings across Denbigh and downtown; LGBTQ-friendly step study available.
newport-news.transitInfo: Hampton Roads Transit bus service connects to Norfolk and Virginia Beach; quick drive across the James River bridges.

norfolk.neighborhoods: Downtown, Freemason District, Ghent, Colley Bayview, Ocean View
norfolk.meetingHighlights: Large selection of daytime and evening meetings; many waterfront locations and campus meetings.
norfolk.transitInfo: HRT light rail and bus network serve the city; ferries connect to Portsmouth; easy access to I-64.

virginia-beach.neighborhoods: Atlantic Ave, North End, Thalia, Town Center
virginia-beach.meetingHighlights: Beachside noon and evening meetings; strong newcomers' support and outdoor summer meetings at the boardwalk.
virginia-beach.transitInfo: Hampton Roads Transit bus service; most attendees drive or bike along the boardwalk in summer months.

richmond.neighborhoods: Downtown, Church Hill, Fan, Shockoe Bottom
richmond.meetingHighlights: Wide variety of meetings including bilingual and speaker meetings; active sponsorship programs.
richmond.transitInfo: GRTC buses provide city coverage; Amtrak serves Richmond Main Street Station; accessible via I-95 and I-64.

alexandria.neighborhoods: Old Town, Del Ray, West End
alexandria.meetingHighlights: Strong rotation of noon and evening groups in Old Town; many commuter-friendly meetings for DC workers.
alexandria.transitInfo: Close to King St-Old Town Metrorail and VRE; DASH and regional bus connections make meetings transit-accessible.

arlington.meetingHighlights: Several early-morning and lunchtime meetings serving commuters; inclusive and LGBTQ-friendly groups.
arlington.transitInfo: Multiple Metrorail stations and ART buses provide excellent transit access; short commute to DC.

roanoke.meetingHighlights: Active recovery meetings across the valley with strong AA fellowship and mountain-area outdoor step meetings.
roanoke.transitInfo: Valley Metro regional bus service covers the city; most meetings are drive-accessible via I-581/I-81.
